fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: e-Invoicing / e-Procurement as a whole and more particulerely the B2G e-Invoicing directive / PEPPOL
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: The goal of the Belgian e-Invoicing Forum is to reunite all relevant stakeholders and to provide 2 representatives in the European Multistakeholder Forum for e-Invoicing
relevant_communication: The Mercurius-Project, i.e. PEPPOL / e-PRIOR in Belgium. Via this B2G e-Invoicing platform can any (local, national, regional) authority receive electronic invoices.
